description:
Looking for the MTG Tarkir Dragonstorm release date? In the second major set of 2025 we’re going back to Tarkir, a dragon-filled world with multiple diverse factions, each inspired by different Asian cultures. This is our one and only revisit to an existing beloved plane next year, so it’s going to be a high point for more established Magic fans.

Continue reading MTG Tarkir Dragonstorm release date and latest news
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: MTG Tarkir Dragonstorm release date and latest news

description:

description:
The Warhammer 40k primarchs are immensely powerful Space Marine generals in Games Workshop's grim, dark Warhammer 40,000 sci-fi wargame universe, and their actions have driven some of the biggest story events to shaped the setting - from the ancient Horus Heresy to current 40k lore. Read on to meet all 20 (or perhaps 18), and find out where they each ended up.

 

Continue reading All the Warhammer 40k primarchs, and where they are now
title: All the Warhammer 40k primarchs, and where they are now

description:
A new special character joins the Dwarfen Mountain Holds for Warhammer the Old World: Burlok Damminson, engineer, inventor, and radical. Though rules for Burlok appeared in the Dwarfs’ Arcane Journal that was released this summer, his miniature is showing up late - ironic, as Damminson is usually to be found at the forefront of any Dwarven expedition, the better to test his new and experimental war machines.

Continue reading Warhammer gives a classic Dwarf mini a new, youthful look
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Warhammer gives a classic Dwarf mini a new, youthful look

description:
There have been many, many MTG cards printed over the years, but most of them are destined to sit in dusty drawers, untouched and unloved. Not these all-stars. Here, we’ve drawn up a list of the very best MTG cards of all time, overperformers from all Magic: The Gathering's many formats. The mere mention of these cards will fill experienced players' hearts with dread and their minds with flashbacks.

Continue reading The best MTG cards of all time
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: The best MTG cards of all time

description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Blade of the Bloodchief has shot up in price, boosted by synergy with the new Jumpstart reveals and a Modern combo deck that’s filled with Eldrazi. Two weeks ago, on October 21, the card cost just $4.80, but now it’s risen by 208% to $14.83, according to MTG Goldfish’s price tracker.

Continue reading MTG card spikes 200% thanks to new commander and combo
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: MTG card spikes 200% thanks to new commander and combo

description:
‘Life-Size DnD’ is a roleplaying experience that lives somewhere between the worlds of LARP and tabletop Dungeons and Dragons. You can physically act out your fantasy adventures as in LARP, but you must obey the movement rules and dice rolls of a D&D-inspired system. I had a chance to try Life-Size DnD at this year’s MCM London Comic Con, and if you thought regular D&D was chaotic, you haven’t seen anything yet.

Continue reading Somehow, life-sized DnD is even more chaotic than the tabletop game
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Somehow, life-sized DnD is even more chaotic than the tabletop game
